original_title: Schaffter’s body to be exhumed on 25th May
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The police say that acting upon the Colombo Chief Magistrate's Court order, the body of popular businessman Dinesh Schaffter will be exhumed on the 25th of May.
The police say that upon the request of the five-member medical team from the court it was decided to  exhume the body of Dinesh Schaffter.
Thus, the second post-mortem will be conducted after the exhumation of the body.
Dinesh Schaffter was found strangled in his car at the Borella Cemetery on 15th of December last year.
He was later admitted to the intensive care unit of the National Hospital and died that night.
